title: Maverick Chef - Novel Updates
tags: Chefs   Cooking   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Tian Shi   田十
description:
Bai Lu grew up in a mysterious prison, where he learnt many interesting abilities.

Also, he had inherited godly cooking skills and possessed exceptional culinary talent.

In a stroke of fate, he arrived in the capital city and opened a shop. Since then, the world has gained an unconventional restaurant, with an eccentric chef, and many odd things have happened.

The Maverick Chef, Bai Lu.>
